Resume

Work Experience & Education

WORK EXPERIENCEPencil&Ruler

SOLIDWORKS | Product Manager
November 2019 – Present

  • Manager for a portfolio of cloud-based CAD apps including the following:
    • xDesign for parametric part & assembly design
    • xFrame for parametric structure design
    • xShape for freeform sub-division design
  • Instrumental in the development and launch of SolidWorks for Makers
  • Expertise in defining and launching products with a focus on meeting customer needs
  • Proven track record of building partnerships with senior leaders and securing agreements
  • Experience collaborating with engineers, designers, and stakeholders to translate customer requirements into actionable design specifications

SOLIDWORKS | Product Definition Intern
August 2018 – May 2019

  • Managed and documented 100+ customer enhancement requests for new functionality
  • Authored technical specifications to guide development projects for design and simulation functionality in SolidWorks

TUFTS CEEO | Student Intern
Summer 2018 & 2019

  • Researched innovative methods to integrate robotics education into classroom curricula
    • In 2018, I developed an AR dashboard for visualizing diagnostic information around robots in real-time
    • In 2019, I worked with LEGO Robotics to develop an easily deployable web-based programing platform for students

EDUCATIONScholar

TUFTS UNIVERSITY | M.S. Mechanical Engineering
Graduated May 2019

  • Balanced 20-30 hours per week at SolidWorks while pursuing full-time studies
  • Coursework included: Advanced Dynamics, Sustainable Design, and Digital Controls
  • Sample projects on GitHub: Quadrotor Simulation, Inverted Pendulum

TUFTS UNIVERSITY | B.S. Mechanical Engineering

  • Graduated Magna Cum Laude
  • Minor in Engineering Management
  • Sample projects on GitHub: "Marauder’s App", Sphero Controller

UNIVERSITY OF AUCKLAND | Semester Abroad

  • Sample project on GitHub: XY plotter with an NI ELVIS II
